member.name: T:CosmosStack.Disposables.DisposableAction
member.summary:
Disable Action.
When the derived class of this class is disposed, the specified will be executed.
释放操作。当派生类释放时，指定的操作 将被执行。

member.name: M:CosmosStack.Disposables.DisposableActionField`1.TryGetAndUnset
member.summary:
Atomically retrieves this disposable action from the field, and sets such field to null. May return null.
以原子方式从字段中检索此一次性操作，并将此类字段设置为 null。 可能返回 null。

member.name: M:CosmosStack.Disposables.DisposableActionField`1.TryUpdateContext(System.Func{`0,`0})
member.summary:
Attempts to update context of disposable action stored in this field, Return false if the field is null.
尝试更新存储在此字段中的一次性操作的上下文，如果该字段为 null，则返回 false。

member.summary:
Cleanup mode
清理模式

member.name: F:CosmosStack.Disposables.DeferredCleanupBase.CleanupMode.ImmediateSynchronous
member.summary:
Cleanup immediately within the current thread.
在当前线程内立即清理。

member.name: F:CosmosStack.Disposables.DeferredCleanupBase.CleanupMode.ImmediateSynchronousIfPastDue
member.summary:
Cleanup immediately if time is past due.
逾期立即清理。

member.name: F:CosmosStack.Disposables.DeferredCleanupBase.CleanupMode.ImmediateDeferred
member.summary:
Cleanup immediately within another thread.
在另一个线程中立即清理。

member.name: F:CosmosStack.Disposables.DeferredCleanupBase.CleanupMode.ImmediateDeferredIfPastDue
member.summary:
Cleanup immediately in another thread if time is past due.
如果时间已过，请立即在另一个线程中进行清理。

member.name: F:CosmosStack.Disposables.DeferredCleanupBase.CleanupMode.Deferred
member.summary:
Extend the timer.
延长计时器。

member.summary:
Attempts to update the stored context.
This method returns false if this instance has already been disposed or is being disposed.
